sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"思想，观点，观念"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: idea, concept, conception, thought, notion, impression
means: idea ： 最普通常用词，几乎适用于任何方面的思维活动。
concept ： 指从众多实例中通过概括、归纳而形成的对事物本质、全貌及其内部联系的概念或看法。
conception ： 通常指个人或一些人所持有的具体概念或念头，也可指概念的形成过程，含一定的想象和感情色彩意味。
thought ： 指以推理、思考等智力活动为基础的心理思维活动及其结果。
notion ： 指的是一种模糊的，变化的莫测的想法，无可靠的基础，未经深思熟虑的观点。
impression ： 指外部刺激在思想中所产生的印象。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"意见，看法，见解"之意。
means: opinion ： 普通用词，使用广泛。多指初步的或缺证据支持因而不十分肯定的意见或看法。
view ： 侧重指个人对较广泛或重大问题所持的看法，常用复数形式。
sentiment ： 着重指基于情感而非推理所得出的，已经固定了的看法，常用复数形式。
idea ： 普通用词，通常指凭感觉和想象所形成的看法或意见。

word_mean: 意，意念。获得印象，形成记忆。

sentence.Network_en: I have a fair idea of how difficult things can be.
sentence.Network_cn: 我大致了解情况会有多困难。

sentence.Network_en: They have only a vague idea of the amount of water available.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们只是大概知道可用水的总量。

sentence.Network_en: Professor Baker is unacquainted with the idea of representative democracy.
sentence.Network_cn: 贝克教授并不熟悉“代议制民主”这一思想。

list.abs: 课文大意（main idea）(Main Idea)。要求从三个选项中选出最能体现课文大意（main idea）的一句。
全文的中心思想(main idea) 是通过各段落的主旨句( topic sentence) 以及内在的联系而体现出来的。 就题型本身而言主要有如下提问.
湖南百通投资有限公司 ... 公司介绍 COMPANY INTRODUCTION 经营理念 MANAGEMENT IDEA 新闻中心 |NEWS CENTER.

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)become (or make someone) ambitious, big-headed, or tempted to do something against someone else's will, especially make a sexual advance
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)开始有野心，变得自负；引诱某人做违背意愿的事（尤指提出性要求

lj.lj_ly: MacDougall began to get ideas above his station.
lj.lj_ls: 麦克杜格尔开始有了超出自己地位的野心。

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)一无所知，完全不知道

lj.lj_ly: she had no idea where she was going.
lj.lj_ls: 她完全不知道自己要去哪里。

lj.lj_ly: it's not my idea of a happy ending.
lj.lj_ls: 这并非我以为的大团圆结局。

jx.jx_en_mean: suggest ambitions or thoughts that a person would not otherwise have had
jx.jx_cn_mean: 使某人存奢望，令某人作他想

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)that suggestion or proposal is worth considering
(informal)used to confirm to someone that they have understood something or they are doing something correctly

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 3): via Latin from Greek idea 'form, pattern', from the base of idein 'to see'

encyclopedia.content: 中国人民大学国际发展交流协会 一、 协会简介 中国人民大学国际发展交流协会（International Development ExchangeAssociation,RUC）简称IDEA，成立于2000年4 月23 日，是中国人民大学第一个学生自己创办，自己运作的具有国际交流性质的学生社团。 自协会成立起，我们一直与包括各国大使馆、知名企业、兄弟院校、社会团体、留学生群体等在内的校内外各相关团体保持紧密联系，积极开展各种丰富多彩的活动，在学生和社会之间搭建了

entry.def: An idea is a plan, suggestion, or possible course of action.

example.ex: It's a good idea to plan ahead...
example.tran: 提前做计划是个好主意。

example.ex: I really like the idea of helping people...
example.tran: 我非常赞同帮助他人的提议。

entry.def: An idea is an opinion or belief about what something is like or should be like.

example.ex: Some of his ideas about democracy are entirely his own.
example.tran: 他关于民主的一些观点完全是他自己的创见。

example.ex: ...the idea that reading too many books ruins your eyes...
example.tran: 读书过多损害眼睛的看法

entry.def: If someone gives you an idea of something, they give you information about it without being very exact or giving a lot of detail.

example.ex: This table will give you some idea of how levels of ability can be measured...
example.tran: 这张表格会让你大致了解能力水平可以怎样评估。

example.ex: Could you give us an idea of the range of complaints you've been receiving?...
example.tran: 你能跟我们大致讲一下今年收到的投诉的范围吗？

entry.def: If you have an idea of something, you know about it to some extent.

example.ex: By the end of the week you will have a clear idea of what your eating habits are...
example.tran: 到这周末你便会清楚自己的饮食习惯了。

example.ex: No one has any real idea how much the company will make next year.
example.tran: 没人真的知道该公司明年会赚多少钱。

entry.def: If you have an idea that something is the case, you think that it may be the case, although you are not certain.

example.ex: I had an idea that he joined the army later, but I may be wrong.
example.tran: 我猜他后来参军了，但也可能我猜得不对。

entry.def: The idea of an action or activity is its aim or purpose.

example.ex: The idea is to encourage people to get to know their neighbours.
example.tran: 其目的是促使人们结识邻居。

entry.def: If you have the idea of doing something, you intend to do it.

example.ex: He sent for a number of books he admired with the idea of re-reading them...
example.tran: 他订购了一些自己喜欢的书，打算重新再读一遍。

example.ex: I had to postpone ideas of a career and stay at home.
example.tran: 我不得不暂缓就业打算，呆在家里。

entry.tran: (表示强调)我不知道/我一点儿都不知道
entry.def: You can use idea in expressions such as  I've no idea or I haven't the faintest idea to emphasize that you do not know something.

example.ex: 'Is she coming by coach?' — 'Well I've no idea.'
example.tran: “她坐长途汽车来吗?”——“哦，我不知道。”

example.ex: We haven't the faintest idea where he is.
example.tran: 我们根本不知道他在哪里。

entry.def: If someone gets the idea, they understand how to do something or they understand what you are telling them.

example.ex: It isn't  too difficult once you get the idea...
example.tran: 你一旦弄懂了，就不太难了。

example.ex: You're beginning to get the idea.

entry.tran: (强调好或糟糕的程度)你都意想不到，你想象不出
entry.def: You can say you have no idea to emphasize how good or bad something is.

example.ex: We are both so happy, you have no idea...
example.tran: 你肯定想象不出来，我们俩都这么幸福。

example.ex: You have no idea how depressed it made me.
example.tran: 你都想象不出这事令我多么沮丧。

means.word_mean: 1. the content of cognition; the main thing you are thinking about;

sentences.sentence: "he has an idea that we don't like him"

means.word_mean: 3. an approximate calculation of quantity or degree or worth;

sentences.sentence: "an estimate of what it would cost"
"a rough idea how long it would take"

means.word_mean: 4. your intention; what you intend to do;

sentences.sentence: "he had in mind to see his old teacher"
"the idea of the game is to capture all the pieces"

means.word_mean: 5. (music) melodic subject of a musical composition;

sentences.sentence: "the theme is announced in the first measures"
"the accompanist picked up the idea and elaborated it"

list.explanation: 不受欢迎的建议或行动，馊主意

auth_sentence.content: Do you have an idea for a new programme?
auth_sentence.res_content: Do you have an idea for a new programme?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Do you have an idea for a new programme?

auth_sentence.content: Pork consumption gives a good idea of the impact.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pork consumption gives a good idea of the impact.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pork consumption gives a good idea of the impact.

auth_sentence.content: Britain has never committed to the idea of Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content: Britain has never committed to the idea of Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Britain has never committed to the idea of Europe.

sentences.en: The firm's directors quickly approved the new idea.
sentences.cn: 公司的董事们很快赞同了这个新想法。

sentences.en: At this moment an idea burst upon him—a glorious idea.
sentences.cn: 此刻他突然产生一个想法, 一个十分美妙的想法。

sentences.en: As generation gap exists, we must bear in mind that the younger people might not like that idea.
sentences.cn: 因为有代沟的存在, 所以我们必须记住, 年轻人可能不喜欢这个想法。

sentences.en: In ideas those two political parties are worlds apart.
sentences.cn: 那两个政党在思想上有巨大分歧。

sentences.en: They look alike but in ideas they are very far apart from each other.
sentences.cn: 他们看起来相似, 但他们在思想方面却截然不同。

sentences.en: After a frank exchange of ideas, the two of them finally broke down their long-standing prejudice against each other and became friends again.
sentences.cn: 开诚布公地交换思想之后, 他们两人终于解开了长期存在的疙瘩, 重归于好。

sentences.en: The report will give you an idea of the problems involved.
sentences.cn: 这份报告将使你对所涉及的一些问题有所了解。

sentences.en: Have you any idea of the time?
sentences.cn: 你知道现在几点钟了吗?

sentences.en: I had no idea of his age.
sentences.cn: 我不知道他多大岁数了。

sentences.en: I've got a fairly good idea of what they want.
sentences.cn: 我已经完全清楚他们要什么。

sentences.en: The police have a good idea how most of the cannabis that is introduced into the country gets past the Customs.
sentences.cn: 警方非常了解传入该国的大部分印度大麻是如何通过海关的。

jushi.english: It might be a good idea to kick off with a few folk songs.
jushi.chinese: 一开始就唱几首民歌,可能是个好主意。

jushi.english: After a frank exchange of ideas, the two of them finally broke down their long-standing prejudice against each other and became friends again.
jushi.chinese: 开诚布公地交换思想之后,他们两人终于解开了长期存在的疙瘩,重归于好。

jushi.english: It was Mary's idea that we should hold the party outside.
jushi.chinese: 我们要在外面举行聚会是玛丽的主意。
